testcase.name: Free CRM Create a new contact scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Page.........................................passed When title of login page is Free CRM........................................passed Then user enters "ksantosh1978" and "Iphone2953"............................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user moves to new contact page.........................................passed Then user enters contact details "Tom" and "Peter" and "Manager"............passed Then user moves to new deal page............................................passed Then user enters deal details...............................................passed Then user click on product page.............................................passed Then click on the new product...............................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
